title: Justpix
description: A project for people to upload, edit, and select product specifications to print an image.

title: MyStylist
description: An AI based clothing app. Users scroll through a series of vertically aligned outfits and the algorithm learns your preferences over time. Users can follow others and see what outfits they wore.

title: NodeFileUpload
description: A NodeJS, MySQL powered file uploading application that allows for multiple CDNs.

title: PhpFileUpload
description: A MySQL, PHP based file uploading site with file sharing, folder sharing, and many more features.

title: Dezar
description: My first client project for their company. The site is no longer active however it was a major milestone in my career.

title: GitAutoDeploy
description: GitAutoDeploy will listen for commits to your repository and if one is detected will automatically clone the repo and run scripts that you define (e.g. npm run build, npm start)

title: LocalDB
description: A local json database that uses fs to run opperations extremely fast. It is designed for rapid updating and mass data retrieval.

title: MangoDB
description: An easy to use MongoDB ORM, async, easily manageable, useful when you want to make changes to the functionality of your database queries without rewriting lots of code.

title: JsonToSql
description: A MySQL ODM, async, easily manageable, useful when you want to make changes to the functionality of your database queries without rewriting lots of code. Makes MySQL queries JSON based for simplicity.
